Description: Fragment of calcite innermost sarcophagus of Merenptah. The piece is part of the foot of the sarcophagus case. It is decorated on the exterior with the first section of the Book of Gates and on the interior with a kneeling winged goddess.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Biban el-Muluk (Valley of the Kings - Thebes)
Curator's comments: PM I Part 2: p.509. E C Brock in C N Reeves (ed.), After Tutankhamun (London & New York, 1992), 130, 136-7.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1990 / Who were the Pharaohs? A History of their Names with a List of Cartouches (p64)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2021-2022 15 Sep–9 Jan, Zaragoza, La Caixa, Pharaoh: King of Egypt 2022 10 Feb–15 May, Palma, La Caixa, Pharaoh King of Egypt 2022-2023 21 Jun–26 Feb, Valencia, La Caixa, Pharaoh: King of Egypt 2023 29 Mar–23 Jul, Lleida, La Caixa, Pharaoh: King of Egypt
